mainPage.infomationDesc:

If you are considering this, please feel free to contact me by DM on X (Twitter) or via the form.

profilePage.title: Profile
profilePage.helloDesc:
Hello! I am a university student from Japan.
20 years old, Composer/Vocaloid, Coding, Accounting.

I love music, especially the genres of JEDM and HappyHardcore. I also compose music and look forward to your requests ‚ù§ü•∞.

In particular, I love the songs of Yasutaka Nakata and Yunomi ‚ù§.
